com.meizu.upspushsdklib.network

类 RetryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meizu.upspushsdklib.network.RetryManager

  • public class RetryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Decides whether a request should be retried or not.
    If you need other behaviour, just extend this class.
    从以下版本开始:
    27.04.14.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected static int[] BACKOFF
      seconds to wait until next retry

    • 构造器概要

      Analyzes whether the cause of an exception is worth retrying the request.
      boolean isRetryUseful(Response response)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RetryManager

        public RetryManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • isRetryUseful

        public boolean isRetryUseful(Response response)
        Indicates whether it would possibly make sense to retry the request.
        参数:
        response - the outcome of the request
        返回:
        true only in case of temporary (server-side) errors where retrying the request could succeed.

      • isRecoverable

        public boolean isRecoverable(WebbException webbException)
        Analyzes whether the cause of an exception is worth retrying the request.
        This is not covering all situations and in case of doubt the exception is considered not recoverable. @YOU: if you find a case where an exception is recoverable, create an issue!
        参数:
        webbException - the exception to analyze
        返回:
        true if it makes sense for the request to be retried again.

      • wait

        public void wait(int retry)
        Implementation for the actual wait (depends on the current retry sequence).
        参数:
        retry - the retry sequence (starts with 0 for the first retry).
